mapper.insert:
insert into punch
punchTime,
campusId,
value,
event,
login,
tardy,
comment,

mapper.update:
update punch
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
punchTime = #{record.punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
campusId = #{record.campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{record.value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
event = #{record.event,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login = #{record.login,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tardy = #{record.tardy,jdbcType=BIT},
comment = #{record.comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update punch set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, punchTime = #{record.punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, campusId = #{record.campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{record.value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, event = #{record.event,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login = #{record.login,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tardy = #{record.tardy,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{record.comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update punch set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, punchTime = #{record.punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, campusId = #{record.campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{record.value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, event = #{record.event,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login = #{record.login,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tardy = #{record.tardy,jdbcType=BIT}

update punch
punchTime = #{punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
campusId = #{campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
event = #{event,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login = #{login,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tardy = #{tardy,jdbcType=BIT},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update punch set punchTime = #{punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, campusId = #{campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, event = #{event,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login = #{login,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tardy = #{tardy,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update punch set punchTime = #{punchtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, campusId = #{campusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, event = #{event,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login = #{login,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tardy = #{tardy,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: --present query select e.description, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , min(case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end) as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where (tardy is null or tardy = 0) and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 0 group by tardy, e.description, campusId, se.event, cast(se.starttime as date) union select a.description, a.day, a.value from ( select tardy, e.description, row_number() over( partition by dbo.week_of_year(se.starttime) order by case when p.campusId is null then 1 else 0 end) as rn, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where (tardy is null or tardy = 0) and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 1 ) a where a.rn = 1 order by day desc

select count(day) as count, coalesce(sum(value), 0) as total from ( select e.description, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , min(case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end) as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where (tardy is null or tardy = 0) and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 0 group by tardy, e.description, campusId, se.event, cast(se.starttime as date) union select a.description, a.day, a.value from ( select tardy, e.description, row_number() over( partition by dbo.week_of_year(se.starttime) order by case when p.campusId is null then 1 else 0 end) as rn, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where (tardy is null or tardy = 0) and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 1 ) a where a.rn = 1 ) a

--tardy query select e.description, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , min(case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end) as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where tardy = 1 and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 0 group by tardy, e.description, campusId, se.event, cast(se.starttime as date) union select a.description, a.day, a.value from ( select tardy, e.description, row_number() over( partition by dbo.week_of_year(se.starttime) order by case when p.campusId is null then 1 else 0 end) as rn, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where tardy = 1 and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 1 ) a where a.rn = 1 order by day desc

select count(day) as count, coalesce(sum(value), 0) as total from ( select e.description, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , min(case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end) as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where tardy = 1 and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 0 group by tardy, e.description, campusId, se.event, cast(se.starttime as date) union select a.description, a.day, a.value from ( select tardy, e.description, row_number() over( partition by dbo.week_of_year(se.starttime) order by case when p.campusId is null then 1 else 0 end) as rn, cast(se.starttime as date) as day , case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end as value from scheduledEvent se join event e on se.event = e.id left join punch p on p.campusId = #{campusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and se.id = eventschedule where tardy = 1 and case when se.allcredit = 1 then e.attendanceValue else value end <> 0 and se.starttime >= #{startterm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and se.split = 1 ) a where a.rn = 1 ) att
